channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Sideblog WordPress Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Sideblog WordPress Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-1787|2024-08-03T00:16:59.877Z -- unknown -- sideblog%20wordpress%20plugin
item.description: The Sideblog WordPress plugin through 6.0 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack and lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting due to the lack of sanitisation and escaping
